name: groovy
bio: Grandmaster Random player with 5400+ MMR experience across all three races. Specializes in teaching game fundamentals and multi-race strategies. Ladder Legends Admin and coach of the month 3 months in a row. Completed over 30 sessions all with success.

name: coach nico
bio: Coach Wars winner and 5.3k aggressive Terran specialist. Expert in harassment, map control, and 2-base timing builds.

name: gamerrichy
bio: Top grandmaster coach with 10+ years of coaching experience and a long history in the pro scene. Head coach of Ladder Legends who focuses on an individual bases and not just standard play. I enjoy helping people and participating in your development personally as well as in game. I have coached over 50+ players to grandmaster from as low an platinum league in my time.

name: krystianer
bio: Top 10 Protoss worldwide with 6943 MMR peak and 270+ tournament wins. Expert in solid macro play and build order execution.

name: eon
bio: Skilled coach with expertise in micro and macro mechanics. Helps players refine their mechanical execution and game sense.Skilled coach with expertise in micro and macro mechanics.

name: hino
bio: Top 80 GM Zerg since 2015 with semi-pro tournament experience including Katowice and DreamHack. Over 500 hours of coaching experience with proven results.
